alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 08 at 8:05PM EST until January 12 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River near Abbeville affecting Dodge, Wilcox and Telfair Counties. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Jackson, Juliette, Griffin, East Juliette, West Macon, Dames Ferry, Macon, Hawkinsville, Byron, Hawkinsville, Clinchfield, Abbeville, McRae, Scotland, Lumber City... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and forecast to continue. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River near Abbeville. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12 feet, Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding of lowlands adjacent to the river begins. The water level reaches the top of the Abbeville boat ramp and also begins to flood the nearby park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EST Saturday the stage was 12.1 feet and steady. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.4 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 12 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
